sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Haitian Creole: Lagè a rèl pou jistis te tout lòt peyi sou - anpil nan chagren an nan otorite yo.
backtrans: The war for justice was all over - much of the grief of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Haitian Creole: Desizyon rejim nan adumbrate ajanda kache a.
backtrans: Decision regime in the adhasive agenda agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Haitian Creole: Kominote a te enkyete sou pase a nan refòm yo anpil nesesè.
backtrans: The community was worried about the past of the reforms needed.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Haitian Creole: Tank la panse pibliye yon papye ki montre ekskiz yo nan pinisyon kapital la.
backtrans: The thought tank publishes a paper showing the exquisite of capital punishment.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Haitian Creole: Aught te rete nan validite petisyon an
backtrans: Augt lived in the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Haitian Creole: Prezidan an ankouraje minis li yo mete senti sekirite kòm sipò opozisyon kle pou plan ekonomik li te sou nan bouk.
backtrans: The President encourages his ministers to put seat belts as key opposition support for its economic plan on the village.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Haitian Creole: Votè yo te chuffed yo wè bòdwo a pase.
backtrans: Voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Haitian Creole: Narasyon discursive avoka a swayed jiri a.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Haitian Creole: Blòk Inyon Ewopeyen an te opoze yon enpozisyon evantyèlman nan mezi anti-moun ap jete fatra.
backtrans: The EU block opposes an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Haitian Creole: Yon eulogy fulsome te delivre nan konsèy la Sly.
backtrans: An Eulogy Fulsome was delivered to the Sly Council.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Haitian Creole: Ajans la Gig-ekonomi deside gani ranbousman yo!
backtrans: The Gig-Economy Agency decided to ban the refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Haitian Creole: Manm nan anti-teyokratik mouvman an revolisyonè detwi kamarad klas yo nan pouvwa!
backtrans: Members of the Anti-Theocratic Revolutionary Movement Destroy classmates in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Haitian Creole: Trèt yo incumidingly deside goumen ak kolonyalis yo.
backtrans: The trets incumidingly decided to fight with colonialists.
